name: Space Colony 3945
description:
In the year 3945, the British Empire has settled the near-moon of G-RAR-7335...

As an AI commander of Her Majesty's Colony, your task is simple, defend the British Colonial Soil from alien invaders using your Cyborg-Jimmy's armies.

How to Play

You need to protect the central processing unit from invaders, don't let them hit your base!

Collect chips to upgrade your robots, yellow to upgrade statistics, blue to change strategies, and red to create new robots (right click with mouse).

Click on your Jimmy's to plug chips in, changing stats and strategies!

Press SPACE to skip directly to the next wave
